description: Free custom roulette creation tool for the web. You can quickly create your own lottery roulette by setting up your favorite items and ratios. No registration required, PC and smartphone compatible.
copyright: Roulette on the Web. All Rights Reserved.
footerTagline: Create and share your own custom roulettes instantly.
cookieBannerText: This site uses cookies for traffic analysis. By consenting to the use of cookies, you help us provide a better service.
declineConfirmation: Your settings have been saved. No information will be collected on this site.
templatesFeatureDescription: Choose from a variety of pre-made templates to get started quickly.
contactDescription: Please feel free to contact us with your opinions, feedback, or bug reports. Please note that inquiries in languages other than Japanese will be reviewed using a translation tool, and our reply will be in Japanese.
agreeToTermsLabel: I agree to the Privacy Policy
agreeToTermsDescription: The information you provide will only be used to respond to your inquiry.
submitSuccessDescription: We have received your message. We will typically respond within 2 business days.
submitError: Failed to send email. Please try again.
submitErrorNetwork: An error occurred. Please check your network connection.
submitErrorServerDefault: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

errorMessage.nameLength: Name must be at least 2 characters.
errorMessage.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
errorMessage.subjectLength: Subject must be at least 5 characters.
errorMessage.messageLength: Message must be at least 10 characters.
errorMessage.inquiryTypeRequired: Please select a type of inquiry.
errorMessage.agreeToTermsRequired: You must agree to the privacy policy.

contactHeroTitle: We'd love to hear from you
contactHeroDescription: To make this site better, we are looking for your opinions and feedback. Please feel free to let us know about feature requests, improvements, etc.
languageHeroDescription: This site supports Japanese, English, Spanish, and French. You can change the language at any time from the language switcher button in the bottom right corner of the screen.
loginHeroDescription: By registering, you can save your original roulettes to My Page. You can access and edit them anytime.
aboutSection1Content: 'Roulette on the Web' was developed to provide a custom roulette creation tool that anyone can use easily and intuitively. We want to help people make fair choices while having fun in various situations, from small daily decisions to event lotteries. By registering an account, you can also save, edit, and reuse your created roulettes.
aboutSection2Content: This tool can be used by a wide range of people for personal, business, and educational purposes, such as deciding where to have lunch with friends, choosing a penalty in a game stream, selecting students in an educational setting, or picking winners at online events. It's also perfect for those who want to save and reuse their roulettes.
aboutSection3Content: We sincerely await your feedback. Please feel free to contact us through the inquiry page as it will be a reference for future development.

auth.loginToSave: You need to be logged in to save. Go to the login page?

error.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
error.passwordLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.

mypage.noRoulettes: You haven't created any roulettes yet.
mypage.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this roulette?

copySuccessMessageRoulette: Copied the roulette URL to the clipboard!
